ratings.question_text: Your level of engagement with the course was:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning.
I received clear feedback that improved my learning.
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the level of intellectual challenge of this course was:
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the workload of this course was:

narratives.question_text: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
comments: Beginning verbal, written, hearing, and speaking skills in Portuguese. Interesting insights on Brazilian culture particularly.
Speaking, writing, listening, Brazilian Portuguese culture
I learned a lot of portuguese.
Learned a lot about the beginning grammatical structure and vocabulary of Portuguese. Learned about Brazilian culture and the ecological, tribal, educational, geographical environment of Brazil.
Learning how to communicate and write in Portuguese

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
comments: This course was well-taught and facilitated to improve student learning. The only weakness is the class size-- twelve or fourteen is much too large for a language section, compared to my Chinese and French sections at Yale (which had around 5 to 8 people.) Also, the seminar room in Pauli Murray was very crowded because of this high number of people.

Very well organized course; fantastic professor; positive learning environment; peers were always engaged and so was I; the professor was more than happy to offer help; exams were fair; presentations were a great learning opportunity; overall one of my favorite courses at Yale so far.
Great professor, I just wish we didnt rely on the textbook so much.

Strengths: Engaging, humorous and eloquent professor. Provides an eagerness to have students improve and shows extreme patience with students which is important for a language professor. Grading was on-time and never deviated from the syllabus in fairness. Feedback always given. Weakness: Wish that assignment due dates were more clear. Test review were also clarified before exams.
Very fun but could have had a more structured curriculum

narratives.question_text: Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
comments: yes! Yuri is an amazing teacher and you will learn so much in only a few short months.
Yes! Fantastic course; you learn a lot of material at a reasonable pace.
Yes, this course was very fun and had a very reasonable time commitment. You will learn a lot about Portuguese.
Yes, highly recommend Portuguese under Prof. Teleginski because it is language of growing importance and it is fun to learn! Brazil is one of the few countries across the world that speak Portuguese.
Yes, class was very engaging and the professor was excellent
